Ananya Pandey Wiki | Biography | Age | Height | Boyfriend | Family | Profile

Bolly Reporter
8 months ago

Ananya Pandey is a star kid and actress of Bollywood Industry. She is the elder daughter of the famous Bollywood actor “Chunky Pandey.” Furthermore, she is one of the most awaited Bollywood star kids who recently debuted in Bollywood.

Biography & Wiki

Ananya Pandey’s nick name is Pandu. She was born on 29 March 1999 in Mumbai, Maharashtra, India. Hence, her current age is 20 years. Ananya’s Zodiac is Aries. Her hometown is in Mumbai, Maharashtra, India.

Height, Weight & Body Measurements

Height (approx.) in centimeters175 cm
Height in meters1.75 m
Height in feet inches5’ 9”

Weight in Pounds119 lbs

Eye ColourDark Brown
Hair ColourBlack

Family Members

Ananya is the daughter of popular Bollywood actor and Comedian Chunky Pandey. Her mother name is Bhavna Pandey, who is a home maker. Her younger sister‘s name is Rysa Pandey.

Boys, Affairs and More

There is a rumour that Ananya Pandey has an an affair with Karan Jaising who is an Entrepreneur. Karan Jaising is the son of famous fashion designer Monisha Jaising

Marital StatusIn a relationship

Education and School, College

As per the information available, Ananya completed her education from Dhirubhai Ambani International School in Mumbai. She went to the University of Southern California in Los Angeles for higher education. Her Educational Qualification is a Graduate.

Salary and Net Worth

Ananya earned ₹3 Crore for her debut movie SOTY 2. Her net worth is $20 million.

Filmography

Ananya Pandey debut in bollywood film industry with Tara Sutaria along with Tiger Shroff in Punit Malhotra’s film ‘Student of The Year 2’ (SOTY 2).

Her next venture will be Pati Patni Aur Woh with Kartik Aaryan in 2019.

Facts about Ananya Pandey

  • Shah Rukh and Gauri Khan’s daughter Suhana and Sanjay and Maheep Kapoor’s daughter Shanaya is bestie of Ananya Panday.
  • Before her debut, she’s already is a social media sensation, courtesy her looks and her cuteness.
  • She is a dog lover and has a pet dog named Fudge.
  • Ananya is very particular about her fitness and has taken her training from the celebrity fitness trainer, Yasmin Karachiwala.
  • She used to wear spectacles in her childhood.
  • She likes to drink alcohol
